title: Pixel 4a update go-arounds, please?!
content:
I *hate* some of the changes to phone operation since the latest update:

camera "zoom" is 1x or 2x, no toggle! WTF??? 

Can only share media with tightly selected social media and Facebook isn't one of them. Only Fb "stories," which also suck. WTF? 

can't use the buttons to screenshot. Ugh. 

halp??
